FERNA ğŸ’¬ Playing Dortmund away, conceding first, PSG away conceding first and then turning it around, was one of the keys for this team to reach the final. 

Don't change a thing, keep our principles, keep going the same way and be relaxed as much as we can. Thatâ€™s my message.

FERNA ğŸ’¬ Itâ€™s not an easy job for Pep to tell the starting XI before the game but itâ€™s part of the game.

Anyone can come in at any time and you have to be ready. My message to the players is the same: be ready because you are important and you never know when you will be needed.

FERNA ğŸ’¬ Itâ€™s a different competition and different game [against Chelsea]. Another history.

The Premier League has gone already - we celebrated.

Tomorrow is a different game against a top team and top players. I hope we can be well prepared, play good and get the result.

FERNA ğŸ’¬ Foden has been with us for almost five years already. The desire he has is incredible. He grew up so much in this season. Heâ€™s played more minutes and kept his feet on the ground. He has become a very important player for this team.

DE BRUYNE ğŸ’¬ [The Portuguese players] have been brilliant from the moment they came here. I have played with Bernardo for four years and we have won many things together - heâ€™s been brilliant, same with Joao and Ruben. They are pushing other players to be better.
DE BRUYNE ğŸ’¬ Obviously it's been one of the goals of the club and one of the players to be here and perform on the highest stage in the world. Itâ€™s a privilege. Everyone understands the pressure.

DE BRUYNE ğŸ’¬ We understand the magnitude of tomorrow. If you win, you're a hero and if you don't youâ€™re almost a failure, even though you are not. If you don't win it'll be something you don't want to experience but it happens.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Against Dortmund we suffered, in the first half in Paris and at the Etihad we suffered against PSG. 

In those moments we have to stick together and try to get momentum and use it. All I can say I am the happiest man right now. It is a privilege. It is an honour.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I am pretty sure we have to suffer to win the final. Most of the time in finals you have to suffer. You have to be resilient. Adjust to the bad moments that are going to happen. At the end we have to be ourselves and do a good game.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I know exactly what I am going to tell [the players]. I don't want to bother them too much. The guys who are anxious or nervous I am going to tell them it is normal and the guys who are more relaxed it is normal as well. 

Everyone will handle it their own way.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We are going to try and do our best game, to do what we have done in our time together. To reach the #UCLFinal is to finish part of the process we started four or five years ago. 

I think it will be a good game and the team that deserves to win will win.

Our players take on some tough questions in the latest episode of Prep Talk! âš½ï¸ Via @Webex

ğŸ¤ @cisco

Manchester will always be your city, @aguerosergiokun ğŸ’™

ğŸ”· #ManCity | https://t.co/axa0klD5re https://t.co/JJmvbnRNX6

PEP ğŸ’¬ I am so confident in my team. 

You cannot imagine how confident I am in my team and what we have to do.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Chelsea give problems to all the teams. 

It's difficult to stop them for the quality they have and their setup. 

Congratulations on the two games they beat us. This is another competition, let's see if we can beat them.

PEP (on @PhilFoden) ğŸ’¬ We can not expect one player who started at 17 to be the same at 20. 

If he was the same player, he would not have played the minutes he has this season. 

He grew up, his ambition grew and he is ready.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We are a similar team to the previous season when we were out. The margins are so small. 

Now we're quite satisfied to get to the final but we know if you don't have a huge desire to win it, we know it won't be possible to win the game and win the Champions League.

PEP (on team selection) ğŸ’¬ They are ready. I know how good they are - all of them. I will not change because of one or two sessions. 

I have known most for many, many years. The starting XI is not done, not yet.

GUNDOGAN on fitness ğŸ’¬ I am alright. I was a little cautious in the Brighton game because of the knock on my knee. I could feel the muscles around it tighten and I didnâ€™t want to pull anything. I didn't miss any training after it. 

I am feeling good, thanks for asking.

GUNDOGAN ğŸ’¬ I just feel like we have the right dynamics in the group. Everything is quite set. Thatâ€™s why I feel we are prepared for it. It is just about repeating what we did. 

I will go into that game with the same confidence I went into all the games before.

GUNDOGAN ğŸ’¬ @PhilFoden has become one of our main players throughout the season. 

He's improved in so many details of his game, mainly making the right decision at crucial times. At such a young age it is really impressive. I wouldn't recommend him to change anything.

GUNDOGAN ğŸ’¬ What I try to do is to keep levels up as high as possible, try to get everyone working 100% on every single training session, not to leave 1% out. 

Thatâ€™s what I have tried to do all season long. It doesnâ€™t change now before that big game.

GUNDOGAN ğŸ’¬ For us it is about preparing to be the best. 

It is probably the biggest game of our careers so far. We will try everything possible to lift the trophy at the end of the 90 minutes - thatâ€™s what we are targeting and preparing for.

PEP ğŸ’¬ {@aguerosergiokun is} like a lion in the jungle, he kills the opponent.

The last goal versus Palace defined him. He controlled two or three steps then wow. So much speed and then the quality to make the goal, he has this quality. He could play till 40 and score goals.

PEP ğŸ’¬ {@PhilFoden is} a guy who likes to play football 24 hours a day. His career is in the good moments but bad moments will come. Now is the moment to understand how diffcult this business is. I'm sure heâ€™s humble, and the guys want the best for him.

PEP ğŸ’¬ {@rubendias' #FOTY21 award} was unexpected honestly, we knew his quality but you never know. 

Heâ€™s shown he can lead. He will improve, he listens, he admits bad moments and enjoys and shares good moments with his mates. For all of us a big congratulations for this award.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Every single day is a headache for me to choose when everyone is fit and training good. But now I have to be straight in my decisions, everyone will understand, itâ€™s so important for us and everyone is committed to help.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Everyone is fit, Sergio trained yesterday and today a little bit, Joao can't play because he was sent off. The rest are fit.

@kylewalker2 couldn't play against Brighton because of a twist in his ankle playing with his boys.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I donâ€™t want to talk about {other teams' players), we are here for one game versus Everton, we respect the competition, they are playing for Europe. We have an important #UCL game too, itâ€™s not nice for me to talk about that right now.

PEP ğŸ’¬ He was incredibly loved by the backroom staff.

Sundayâ€™s the last game, Iâ€™m sure the fans will give him a tribute to what he has done so far; titles, numbers, performances, incredible.

PEP ğŸ’¬ {@aguerosergiokun is} an incredibly nice and funny person, humble being the legend he is. Being from Argentina and in this country where itâ€™s so diffcult to score goals heâ€™s done it for many years.

PEP ğŸ’¬ When I was here in the first season I didn't win anything, and I canâ€™t forget the disappointment of Lyon, and the support I had from the chairman. Our success is dedicated to him supporting me. Saying that we now have two weeks before a dream come true in the #UCL final.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Itâ€™s a special gratitude to our sporting director Txiki, heâ€™s a friend of mine and it would be hard without him and especially Khaldoon. I travelled to see him in November and we had long discussions together, he said I still had a lot of work to do and I trust him a lot.
PEP ğŸ’¬ When Leicester won we came here (CFA) in the bubble, everyone was safe. We trained a bit, we danced, laughed, remembered how good it was. 10-15 pizzas arrived too which was the best moment!

PEP ğŸ’¬ The target next season is the same and every season compared with the first year I arrived opponents are stronger. Every year they are stronger, Liverpool will be back again, Chelsea, Leicester, always are there. Arsenal, they trust Mikel, they will take a step forward.

PEP ğŸ’¬ This title is important but we make a big picture, in the last decade City won 5 and last 5 won 3, thatâ€™s incredible. 

I am most proud of sustaining the work ethic. I never expected when I arrived because I know how this country changes but we were always there.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I appreciate a lot (Klopp) and Ancelotti have done it (sent congrats messages). I couldnâ€™t answer the messages yet but I will do today. I appreciate and admire them.

Iâ€™d say thank you so much, I appreciate it a lot from him and Carlo Ancelotti.
PEP ğŸ’¬ (@DeBruyneKev is) still injured but heâ€™s getting better. When he is fit he will come to training, and the guys with 100% physicality will have a chance to play in the (#UCL) final.
PEP ğŸ’¬ This (league title win) in the pandemic around the world makes this title different but the pleasure to win and the effort behind it makes every title special. Itâ€™s so nice.

PEP ğŸ’¬ In one season you can win something but to be consistent over years and years there is one secret: have quality players. 

The quality of the players. We try to buy as good players to sustain it for a longer time.

PEP ğŸ’¬ To play every three days, we don't have training. I don't feel like on the pitch we can develop because we don't have time. 

The reason we are doing well is the quality of players and they are intelligent.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I like players who have the ability to keep the ball. Itâ€™s one of the principal things I am looking for. 

Players have to keep it in difficult circumstances.

PEP ğŸ’¬ The success of the season so far is the humanity and quality of players. 

The second is not thinking much outside of the next game.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Now when you play at home it isn't a big advantage. You play without fans. We play in Paris and it is not a big difference from what it will be like on Tuesday. 

The point is we have been consistent home and away. We need five points to be champions.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Tomorrow we have an incredible opportunity to make that step. 

We now recover from Paris - itâ€™s our sixth game in a row away. We are tired in many aspects. Tomorrow we play at 12.30 so we don't have extra time to recover from Paris. This is my only concern.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Let me travel to London, wake up good and try to win the game. The rest we cannot control. Itâ€™s a tough job to do. 

Always I donâ€™t remember an easy game against Palace, itâ€™s all we can do.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: Football is unpredictable. You can have more chances and lose. And have better stats and lose. That is why football is fantastic. We will try and do our game. Bayern tried to attack and PSG tried to attack and when that happens, football is nice.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: (Foden and Mbappe) play different positions. It is difficult to compare. Both are young, incredibly talented players. No doubt about that. I am sure PSG are so happy to have Mbappe. And I am incredibly happy to have Phil. a Man City supporter, come through the academy.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: I learned from Johan Cruyff, enjoy the game. Enjoy the responsibility. Enjoy the situation.

We are privileged to be one of the final four teams this season. To be here is not to be worried, sad. This is the mindset the greatest teams and greatest athletes have.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: We will concede counter attacks and chances. They have the quality. Extraordinary. Ony way to minimise these things is impose your game.

The more you are yourself, the more chance of getting through. If you think about the opponent, itâ€™s harder. In these stages.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: Everyone is fit and ready and happy I think. I am grateful to have this opportunity to be there. For us it is new and we are incredibly grateful to live it. 

We know what we have to do. One game at a time. We go there and try to win that game.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: Every time you get older, you realise how hard it is to win titles.

The Carabao Cup is not the biggest title. But the joy was there when we won. In our minds now itâ€™s PSG. We want to win tomorrow, we are not thinking about the Premier League.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: We are not in the elite in the #UCL, thatâ€™s for sure, but we want to be there. 

In the last years we always play this Champions League and we are lucky to be where we are now. I am incredibly happy to travel to Paris to play - the target is to be ourselves and win.

ğŸ’¬ PEP: (On Stones new contract) I don't know. No comment, itâ€™s not my business. Itâ€™s Txiki and the agent.
 
(Stones has) had good, good moments during our time here but this season was his best. He had no injuries, he is stable and thatâ€™s why he did a really good season.

ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: They [PSG] are an absolutely wonderful team. We saw that in the game against Bayern Munich. We have our strengths, they have their strengths and we will see tomorrow how it all works out.

ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: We are in good form approaching the end of the season. Ultimately we always want to play our game, showing lots of character and that we are here to win. Weâ€™re not here to make up the numbers in the semis. We are here to win, absolutely.

ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: You play football for these types of games and stages. I knew when I signed that with this team and manager we would arrive here. But you have to show you deserve to be in the final. It is done by showing your personality in the big games and the big moment.
ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: I am very good here. I love the club. I love the city. I am just concentrating on the team and trying to win things together.

ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: It [The Champions League] is the best thing you can play for and win. If we can try and get to the final, then we will see. The most important thing is tomorrow and hopefully we can go through.

ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: For me, last season was the biggest disappointment of my career, to not beat Lyon. It helped us a lot this season. This season we were so determined to go through... we had the experience of previous seasons and we were much better.

ğŸ’¬ MAHREZ: Obviously Pep has done a lot of things for football. He deserves to be praised this way. We know how important he is for us. It is good to hear these things.

He tries to help us a lot for the games. Tactically he helps us a lot.

PEP ğŸ’¬ (@PhilFoden has) played more minutes and when you play more minutes you are a better player. He was a boy when I arrived and now he plays important minutes. He is stronger physically. He can get stronger. He is a better player but he can still be better.
PEP ğŸ’¬ Itâ€™s a final and we want to win but we have the Champions League. PSG is there and then Crystal Palace are there and then PSG is there. We will see what happens on Sunday.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We cannot deny the Champions League is close and the Premier League is not over and they are more important. But we want to win this competition. Tottenhamâ€™s commitment will be incredible and the quality of their players is extraordinary.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Yes (@DeBruyneKev and @aguerosergiokun trained today).

Today was (Aguero's) first training session in two weeks and tomorrow we will then decide.

PEP ğŸ’¬ (On new #UCL format) All the time managers ask for better quality and the football world wants quantity. We are not in charge of that. We have to ask UEFA / FIFA to extend the year. Instead of 365 days, maybe they can find 400? Maybe they have a solution.

PEP ğŸ’¬ There are many issues in society where human rights can be improved. The people on many issues show their values and sometimes we react for a football issue - for human rights, for better society we are not so committed like we are in an issue like football.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We deserve to be here. We had a tough competition, especially in the semi-final. We were there and every team wants to win finals. We will travel to London to play a good game and try to win the title.

PEP ğŸ’¬ In the most important part of the season, when we fight for the titles Lewandowski could not play against PSG because he got injured on international duty. UEFA decided that because itâ€™s their business and Lewandowski could not play. Everyone is for themselves.

PEP ğŸ’¬ They have to clarify and make it real clear what is the next step and then people can decide what to do. Then we have to go together as much as possible. But at the same time, donâ€™t be cynical. Everyone thinks for themselves. UEFA thinks for themselves.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Arriving at this point, UEFA have failed. They have to clarify all the information. We fought to make five subs in the toughest season ever because of the pandemic and people fought for themselves. Everyone is struggling in this situation.

PEP ğŸ’¬ The players have to focus on Aston Villa. It is a worldwide issue and it needs to be clarified why these teams are in and others arenâ€™t like Ajax who have four or five Champions Leagues. They have to clarify that.

PEP ğŸ’¬ No, because it is an embryo that is still not yet breathing. It is just a statement. It is not breathing. It is a reality. We are going to play the UCL next week and try to reach the final next season, we are going to play in Europe because we deserve it.

PEP ğŸ’¬  It is not a sport if success is guaranteed or if it doesnâ€™t matter when you lose. I have said many times I want a successful Premier League, not just one team at the top. I donâ€™t know if the statement will change and four or five teams will be able to go up.

PEP ğŸ’¬ As I said, I don't have all the info. I have some info. If you ask me why these teams have been selected to play this hypothetical competition in the futureâ€¦ sport, is not a sport when the relationship between effort and reward does not exist.

PEP ğŸ’¬  I would love the president of the committee to go out around the world and explain how we got this decision.

I support my club. I love to be part of this club. But I also have me opinion; right now it is just a statement. That's why it is uncomfortable for the managers.
PEP ğŸ’¬ The presidents can speak more clearly about where football is going to go. It is uncomfortable for us because we don't have all the info. I can give you my opinion, but no more.

PEP ğŸ’¬ A few hours before the statement was released, like the rest of my colleagues. They told me we were going to release a statement. The statement is there but nobody speaks clearly with more details of what is going to be created.

PEP ğŸ’¬  The important thing is fighting every year to be there. For the players in the past who could not do it I am more than delighted for them to reach the semis. We would love to reach the FA Cup final. After that we focus on Villa and then PSG.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Sometimes, when it is tough, and you need time and you spend a lot of years to get something, you give more value. That is why it is so nice. It is like life. Everything you get without effort is not nice. We know how difficult it was to reach the semi finals.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Every manager plays the way they believe. Frank did an incredible job. First season he couldn't sign players. He had an incredible run in the Champions League. I admire them both. Tomorrow I face Thomas. He knows how much I admire him. It will be a good battle.
PEP ğŸ’¬ Arriving ahead of the next six weeks in the best condition. He extended his contract, it is not just good for him, but his family and ourselves. Hopefully he can keep his level.

PEP ğŸ’¬ He [De Bruyne] is arriving in a good mood. Against Leicester after the international break he was outstanding. He didnâ€™t play against Leeds, I tried to have everyone involved. In Dortmund he played well.

PEP ğŸ’¬ You know my answer to this lovely question. We are not in the position to look much further. You want to talk about the future, but the reality is the training today and tomorrow. That is my only concern. The rest, I couldn't care less.
PEP ğŸ’¬ Yeah. Maybe I am going to play the best team on the pitch to win the game. I am pretty sure tomorrow I will play the best team to win tomorrow.

PEP ğŸ’¬ It is much, much, much easier. Imagine playing this game after not qualifying for the UCL semis, it would be much tougher. I would love to have more days to recover and prepare, but the schedule is the schedule. You handle the schedule.

PEP ğŸ’¬ After he went to Dortmund. The way he wants to play is so quick. It is tough to take over a team in the season. But he has a lot of experience being at a top club like PSG and now Chelsea. I knew from the beginning that he would do a good job. [Tuchel]

PEP ğŸ’¬ If you know the trajectory of the team with the selections, the answer is obvious. Of course they can play together. It is obvious. Phil can play in five positions. Sterling can play in three positions. Everyone can play different positions. It depends on them.

PEP ğŸ’¬ It is the only way they can win all the present and win all the future. With Phil in that case, everything we get right now is on the grass. You have to do something to win every game to stay in the team.

PEP ğŸ’¬ It is not about what we believe in the past. It is about what they show on the grass. Footballers have to show every day. Journalists talk a lot about the past and the future but it is about what we have to do today. They have to talk on the grass.

PEP ğŸ’¬ No not, yet. [Aguero back]

Yeah, they [rest of squad] are okay. Tired, but in a good mood. They are okay.

PEP: We are already the first qualified for the #UCL. So now, 11 years in a row we will be in the Champions League. No team in the Premier League has every done 11 in a row., that is fantastic. For sure, nobody will give it to us - we have to do it.

PEP: We have to try and execute our plan. It doesnâ€™t matter what happens in the first leg, you have a chance in the second. Our idea is to go there do as best as possible and let them feel we are not going to defend what we got here. We want to impose our game to win the game.

PEP: Itâ€™s a pleasure to be again here. Next season it will be again because we have already qualified for the #UCL. 

We train, fly there, have a good dinner. We are looking forward. Nothing is guaranteed. We had a good result in our first game. We will play to try and win.

PEP: (Fans at the Carabao Cup Final) Itâ€™s the first step. If the government say we can do, itâ€™s good news. Hopefully in the future it will return to normality, but at the same time, follow the instructions from the government and scientists.

Tune-in live as Pep and @IlkayGuendogan face the press ahead of our decider in Dortmund ğŸ’¬

ğŸ”· #ManCity | https://t.co/axa0klD5re

ILKAY: I think for Gabby there are no limits for him. He has already done great in the years he has been here. I don't know if it has an influence on him, in terms of Sergio leaving and the game Gabby plays. What I know is he brings everything to be a world class striker.

ILKAY: Defending a result does not fit the way we play as players and as a team. We should go to win the game. Thatâ€™s what we are used to and thatâ€™s how we will handle the game in Germany, the same as we did here.

ILKAY: Itâ€™s exciting (to have fans at the Carabao Cup Final). We had one game this season away at Southampton when we had 2000 fans in the stadium. 

It is a feeling we need to get used to again. Not just for the people, but for us, it will be great to have them back.

ILKAY: It is something I definitely want to achieve, to win the trophy. We have a really good chance with this club. It is not just about chances, it is about taking them. We try to go step to step. This year is another chance. We will try to do our best to go as far as possible.

ILKAY: I think the more you proceed in this competition, the more important it gets. It gives you confidence when you know the goalkeeper and the defence are working well and combined with the feeling we can score, thatâ€™s a great potential.

ILKAY: Going to Dortmund and knowing there is no crowd, it feels like it is a disadvantage for Dortmund. I played there for five years, I know how loud it can be in that stadium. It was the same at our stadium last week. There is something missing in football at the moment.

ILKAY: (Haaland) is a great talent, a great player, an exciting prospect. He scores a lot of goals. He is physically strong, he is quick. He is determined, he goes into the spaces that may hurt and he is able to hurt every team he faces. His numbers are outstanding.

ILKAY: I still follow (Dortmund) a lot. I still try to watch as many games as possible in the Bundesliga when they play. I know they have a lot of quality in the squad, quick fast technically really good players. On their day they can beat every single team in europe.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We're delighted with these players - hopefully more can join them. I can talk myself. I've been here five years and I will be two more, if the situation goes well. I am glad Kevin, who can play for anyone, decides to stay with us. Itâ€™s a big compliment for Manchester City.
PEP ğŸ’¬ So important so far [Dias], still you have two months before the end of the season, but the quality and leadership is there.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Convinces players to follow him. Thatâ€™s why I recognise the best. People say he didn't win titles - give him Manchester City and he will win titles. Always his players become better players. That is a sign when the manager is good.

PEP ğŸ’¬ His teams are one team before his arrival and then when heâ€™s gone. His teams are always better. You see it. Belongs absolutely to him. For world football, itâ€™s a joy. A guy who respects opponents and play for fans, spectators. Doesn't just play for victory.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I'm never involved in contracts - it belongs with Txiki and the club. But my personal opinion is I'm more than delighted. Hopefully we can take a good step forward in the future. If the club is satisfied and Kevin is satisfied, there's a third person satisfied and itâ€™s me.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Managers are alone in defeats - players follow when you win and leave when you lose. And when you win you smell good. When you win, everything is good, when you don't it's not. Always better to be calm. Football is played by human beings and human beings are not perfect.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Not just the numbers and results - sometimes itâ€™s a consequence. I admire a lot of things they do, especially how they behave on the pitch. It doesn't matter the opposition or competition. They demand you do things you are not used to.

PEP ğŸ’¬ His work ethic, his knowledge of the game...I know how tough tomorrow at 12.30pm will be. I hope we're prepared to compete. We're three games away and tomorrow is a big step. The players know from the first game how difficult it was and tomorrow will not be an exception.

PEP ğŸ’¬  He doesn't do anything for the media or for himself. Thatâ€™s why I am overwhelmed because everyone knows the admiration, respect...always he will be in my heart. If there is one person who can find the secrets, it is him.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I am overwhelmed. I feel weird. He is a huge competitor. I am not going to try to be weak after these words. I am overwhelmed because he is the mots honest person. When I was able to speak to him, what he says is what he believes. [Bielsa praise]

PEP ğŸ’¬ Hopefully. World football can help but it will not solve. It is society, school, families, day by day - an education every second of our lives. If we can help through footballâ€™s platform, more than welcome. [Stopping online abuse]
PEP ğŸ’¬ We will see from Kevin what he wants to be. This type of player, with seven, eight years here. What he wants is possible - it depends on him.

PEP ğŸ’¬ The only concern I have is tomorrow. I cannot tell you about a quadruple, double, triple, single. 

All we can do is play a good game tomorrow. Then see what happens in the second leg.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I know how @IlkayGuendogan behaved when he was injured and in bad moments. He is incredibly beloved because he is such an incredible guy. 

He thinks not just about himself but the team.

PEP ğŸ’¬ @IlkayGuendogan deserves this role of leadership through what he has done on the pitch, it is the best way to show his ability. 

I'm delighted with the external recognition he gets now because he is scoring goals and making assists. 

He deserves it.

PEP (on last season's UCL exit) ğŸ’¬ It was painful, I cannot deny it. It was the last game of the season. We wanted to go through. We congratulate Lyon. 

But we are here again to try again.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Everyone in this club wants to go as far as possible. 

We have to show on the grass. We have to beat our opponents, like we have done many times this season in all competitions.

RODRIGO ğŸ’¬ @IlkayGuendogan has done an outstanding, unbelievable season! 

Not only goals and assists, but what he does on the pitch, his moves, understanding of the game - he's very important for us. 

We have to pass him the ball! Thatâ€™s the reality.

RODRIGO ğŸ’¬ @aguerosergiokun is a very important player for us. 

Of course, he deserves to go in the best way of this club. 

For me, it would be a dream to achieve this competition with him and the team. It would be the best present for him and everyone.

RODRIGO ğŸ’¬  I remember facing Dortmund with Atletico and it was a tough game. 

They have a mix of young and experienced players. They have an offensive squad, we have to be aware of this. They like going forward and scoring goals. 

We have to be aware and play our game.

RODRIGO ğŸ’¬  I want to win everything and I take the same ambition to every competition. 

Itâ€™s a very tough competition. It demands a lot, there are only two games and anything can happen but of course, it demands focus for 90 minutes.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Liam (Delap) is doing incredibly well - we are in touch with Enzo Maresca to see how (EDS players) are developing. Next season he will be with us, training with us every day.

PEP ğŸ’¬ With these prices we will not buy any striker. Itâ€™s impossible. We will not afford it. All the clubs struggle. We are not an exception. 

I don't know what is going to happen. Today, there is more chance we will not buy a striker next season.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I believe in modern football no player cannot sustain, physically or mentally, playing 11 months every three days. Tomorrow I will select a team to win that game. People say we are close. We are in the best position. After that game I will think of Borussia Dortmund.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We will see today how the players come back. Every day is a new situation. The (COVID) tests are negative and tomorrow we will prepare for the game. We will be closer to winning the title if we win and then every game after that is a final.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Since Brendan took over (Leicester), after one week, they changed completely. Last season, because of lockdown they had an incredible chance to qualify for UCL but couldn't do it. They have a chance again now. 

Top manager, top players - big challenge for us tomorrow.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We know how important a player (Aguero) is in the present and the past. These decisions are never easy. 

Itâ€™s almost impossible to replace (in terms of numbers). But in terms of what he means to this Club, we cannot replace.

PEP ğŸ’¬ He's a player for Borussia Dortmund [Haaland] - I don't like when people talk about our players. You understand I cannot answer this question.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Dortmund is tough but all of them would've been. We try to play a good first game and then a good second game. If we do good games, we will go through, if they do good games they will. There are no more secrets than that.

PEP ğŸ’¬ The numbers speak for themselves he [Haaland] is one of best strikers in the world at his age. I saw a few games, highlights and the numbers in the Champions League are impressive. I know the quality of this player, everyone knows. In two weeks, I can answer better.
PEP ğŸ’¬ The quality of the players is there - no doubts about that. They're fighting for qualification for the Champions League - that shows how good they have been.

PEP ğŸ’¬ He should have said that to the United team who proved we are not [unbeatable]. It is a final tomorrow. You have to immediately realise how they play, how to find space, how to control set pieces because they have a master in Sigurdsson.

PEP ğŸ’¬ He has been manager of some of the best clubs in Europe - Milan, Juventus, Napoli, PSG, Madrid. All places he had success. He took care of me when I started. I visited him when he was at Milan. Always off the pitch he is so gentle. I admire him a lot [Ancelotti].

PEP ğŸ’¬ Every competition is [hard]. It's a knockout game. We won once, reached the semis twice...itâ€™s not bad! I know how important this competition is. We know how difficult it is to beat Everton - we were there a few weeks ago.

PEP ğŸ’¬ It is what it is. In more than two weeks, we will face them. Itâ€™s a privilege to be in the last eight teams. I didn't see much but in this international break we will have a chance. They are a really good team [Dortmund].

PEP ğŸ’¬ (Clean sheets are) so important in all competitions. It doesnâ€™t mean tomorrow it will happen. Every game is different.

I have incredible respect for Gladbach. They have weapons and they know how to use it. I want to see the team try to win the game.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I am more than satisfied (with Bernardo). Hopefully he is too with the way he is playing and the positon he is playing.

I am so satisfied for his level since day one. His level, except for a period last season when it dropped for a little bit, has been magnificent.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Right now (this City team) is worse than the previous ones because the other ones won a lot and this team hasnâ€™t won anything. 

We are validated for the trophies we can win, especially from the outside. The previous teams won. This team has to prove it.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Four titles has never happened before and I donâ€™t think it will happen this season with the situation. The only thing to think about is this game and then Everton.

I donâ€™t know what will happen at the end of the season, but normally, it does not happen.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Sterling travels with the team. All the squad travel to Budapest.

All the players reacted really well. I don't expect them to be happy with not being selected. It is normal. It has always happened since football was created. Raheem is so important to the team.

OLEKS ğŸ’¬ Ruden Dias is so important for us. Since he came we have had that confidence. 

The job John Stones, Joao Cancelo, Walker and the other defenders have done is incredible. The main reason I would say (that we are more solid in defence) is because we have worked so hard.

OLEKS ğŸ’¬ We have got an unbelievable squad. Everyone deserves to play. You are just fighting for your chance to show your quality, your class and to show you deserve to play another game. We are pushing each other. It is extra motivation. We move each other forward.

OLEKS ğŸ’¬ Inside the dressing room, I can see the hungry eyes. Everyone is so hungry for the titles. That is what we want.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Why do you not have to play football? Maybe I'm wrong, but these guys are saying to their team, you're good enough to go there to try and win the game. Other managers say now, we're going to sit back. Scott Parker went to Anfield and tried to play. That's quite remarkable.

PEP ğŸ’¬ They are working a lot to find a solution, but the grass isnâ€™t good. All the players know how good the grass is and sometimes it is not. There are stadiums where the grass is good. Arsenal, Anfield, Old Trafford - even Budapest, the grass is better. Our grass is not good.
PEP ğŸ’¬ He [Parker] is younger. He has hair. He is better than me, definitely. I accept a draw against him! [Best dressed manager]

PEP ğŸ’¬ Sometimes the players have the ability to provoke falls. This is a talent too. It is the refs job to decide. It is one of the toughest jobs they have. The game is faster than ever. That is why VAR is there, to wait ten seconds and have a look.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Nobody guaranteed with 11 players in the 18 yard box that youâ€™ll have the success to win. Nobody knows that. That's why I prefer it as a spectator. I think all the new generation of managers are saying weâ€™ll do our game rather than wait to see what the opponents do.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Okay. Just defend with ten players behind the 18-yard box. They can do that. If I was a spectator I would prefer to watch the first fifteen minutes of Southampton. They have the courage to play. That doesnâ€™t mean you donâ€™t defend.

PEP ğŸ’¬  All the new generation of managers have this quality. All the managers in Germany and Spain play like they manage Bayern Munich. Sometimes they can't do it. You have the idea that you are going to lose a lot of games, but you are going win the games you need to.

PEP ğŸ’¬ A lot. It is what I admire the most. What I admire is that when it is not going well they continue to do it and at the end the results come. They make the sport nice, when both teams want to attack and create, not just wait for one mistake.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I'm going to tell you a secret, the Manager of the Month and Player of the Month is because we win games. It is not that Gundo is better than another player in the league or I'm a better manager. It's simply, the players behind and the backroom staff who help us win games.

PEP ğŸ’¬ In my fifth season in England, I have never seen the lower teams with this quality of play. We saw it with Southampton. The way they play is incredible. I saw it here with Fulham. The pace they play with, the organisation.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Since day one, they have played incredibly well. They were relegated with Scott and at the end of the season they were promoted. In English football there are incredibly good managers with Mr Potter at Brighton and Scott at Fulham. Many of them have courage to play.
PEP ğŸ’¬ If he [Wilder] was here, he would be fighting for the title. If i was in Sheffield I maybe would be fighting relegation.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Right now it is not official. My press officer told me it is not official. I prefer not to comment on that. I have a good relationship with him when we faced each other. I wish him all the best if he is still there [Chris Wilder].

PEP ğŸ’¬ Everyone is ok. [Fully fit squad] ğŸ˜ƒ

PEP ğŸ’¬ It was a lovely journey. All three options were there. Congrats to President Laporta for being elected. His personality will introduce a good mood. I wish him all the best for this season and the next seasons.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I didn't watch the game. Maybe we will play in the FA Cup. Firstly because I don't have time. I watch many Southampton games. The quality they do, we suffered a lot to beat them there. We will have to do a good performance tomorrow to get the result.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Itâ€™s not a bad moment. A bad moment is playing bad and not getting results in a lot of games. We are close - every team is fighting for something. We are seeing how tough the games are. Tomorrow will not be an exception.
PEP ğŸ’¬ Maybe. I will decide tomorrow [Aguero and Foden to start]. I have an idea of course about who will play, but tomorrow I will decide.

PEP ğŸ’¬ No, absolutely not. Even when we win, itâ€™s forgotten. When we lose, the same. We are not going to be depressed - itâ€™s football. You can lose games. The not normal thing is what we have done [winning run].

PEP ğŸ’¬ There is still a lot of work to do to arrive in the last games in contention to win the Premier League. We are alive in all competitions. It doesn't matter what happens tomorrow - of course we want to win - but there are still many games.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Mix of disappointment, sadness. Second day was better and today completely on fire. Itâ€™s a common reaction. Everyone realised how difficult it is to win good games, to do a good run. We did it and now we focus on the next one.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Yeah, of course, when the option is open, everything can happen in football. United can do it, absolutely agree. We have ten games left and we have to win six or seven to do it mathematically.
PEP ğŸ’¬ No, we will score 18. 18-0 will be the result...what a question! They conceded nine...come on be serious. We will try to win the game!

PEP ğŸ’¬ No run exists. Itâ€™s one game at a time. We play Southampton and try to do a good game. I am a big fan of the style Ralph and the way his team play. Itâ€™s another test to play good and try to win.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We always think we can do better. But itâ€™s about how we handle good moments. When you win something, it doesn't mean you will win in the future.

We have been magnificent, no one can deny it, but you don't win in March. I see something in the team. Everyone wants to win.

PEP ğŸ’¬ No words inject desire into the players. It comes from wanting to compete with team mates and do the best we can. People are saying nice things because we are winning. The smell when you win is beautiful but we can lose. That's why our perspective is calm.

PEP ğŸ’¬ (on quarantine) It makes no sense to go to an international team and then not be able to play for ten days. We work all season here. We spend a lot of time, effort, money to invest in that - for 6/7 players to miss time at this time in the season makes no sense for us.

PEP ğŸ’¬ You can play with seven defenders and win and play with more strikers and be defensive. The (derby) game (in December) was not good, the analysis said it was boring. But we admit in that period we were not at our best. But the intention was to try and win the game.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I always prepare (in order) to beat the opponents. We know the quality they have. I was very impressed with the way they played at Stamford Bridge. We accept the challenge and want to do a good game to try and win it.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I know how difficult United are. I have the feeling they are a better team every season. They haven't lost away for more than one year. They always get good results here at Etihad Stadium - but we know the opportunity we have to extend our advantage.

PEP ğŸ’¬ Yes it's good news for us, @NathanAke is back. He made the training sessions and felt really good. Yeah everyone is fit. It is important for us and hopefully after the international break everyone comes back really well.

It's almost time to hear what the boss has to say ahead of the latest instalment of the Manchester Derby!

Congratulations to all the people. Every league is tricky and when you win it is well deserved.
PEP on injury news ğŸ’¬ Everything is fine. Except Nathan (Ake) the rest of the players are fine.

PEP ğŸ’¬ I said before, we are delighted with what we have done so far. We cannot deny it. No team has done it before. That shows how difficult it is. 

We are so happy, but at the end what counts is the trophies. 

We have a lot of work to do and I think we can still improve.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We know exactly the type of game we have to play - to be so intense but be calm. They play with ambition and patience to punish you. 

We have to be so clever because the last years have been tough, with the quality of players they have. This year will be no exception.

PEP on unbeaten run ğŸ’¬ I think we were consistent in many, many of the last four years. 

It is always nice, but it is the next game - we're not thinking about it. 

We are here to try and win the titles. The people demand this and for this we have to win the next game.

PEP ğŸ’¬ To win 20 could be the greatest achievement we've done. It doesn't mean we win the title of course, but in winter time in England, every three days a game, covid situation, injuries...winning, winning, winning shows strength mentally.

PEP ğŸ’¬ We must rest mentally and physically. If not, you cannot sustain it. Itâ€™s many games but the big teams have to do it. From tomorrow, we look towards Wolves - in past years we suffered against them.

PEP ğŸ’¬ When you have a run of many many victories, you have games like this. I remember Brighton we suffered a lot for 20 minutes, Fulham as well. Games are so different. Teams create problems for us.
